title: Burton Feelgood Smalls Snowboard - Girls' 2022
description: The Burton Feelgood Smalls Snowboard is designed for kids who've already mastered the basics of snowboarding and are ready to take the next leap in the progression cycle. This board features a lively PurePop camber profile for more snap off the lip and more energy moving from edge to edge. Still a versatile twin tip shape with the same flex fore and aft, and perfect for young riders seeking to ride regular and switch with equal dexterity, the Feelgood Smalls is worthy of carrying the proven Feelgood name.

title: Burton Chicklet Snowboard - Girls' 2022
description: Start your young shredder off right with gear that is made to help her succeed. The Burton Chicklet Snowboard features a predictable and stable Flat Top™ profile with Easy Bevel shaping for a beginner-friendly, catch-free ride to help build skill progression without the additional pressure of an unforgiving traditionally cambered board. The durable extruded base is made for day after day of practice so your young one can get turning quickly.

title: Nitro Squash Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: Your job is to set them up for success in society. To teach them how to be a good person, a caring citizen, and a worthwhile adult. You're a good parent. You're doing everything right. It is now time for a Nitro Squash Snowboard to enter the curriculum. This is the same board the Nitro team uses to achieve their max speeds and all-round enjoyment, just a bit smaller. Your grom deserves it, snowboarding deserves it, the world at large demands it: get your ripper on this board and stand back. They (and you) will thank Nitro for this amazing learning tool. We can't wait to see what your shred spawn does with it!

title: K2 Mini Turbo Snowboard - Little Boys' 2022
description: Spool up that turbo, and get ready for some pint-sized fun - the K2 Mini Turbo Snowboard has been the gateway to grom greatness for years, and this one is no different. A user-friendly rocker-flat-rocker profile and easy-going Catch-Free™ Tune make this the choice for youth shredders everywhere.

title: Rossignol Jibfluence Snowboard - Kids' 2021
description: Based on the award-winning Jibsaw board, the Rossignol Jibfluence Snowboard brings the same high-octane freestyle energy to lighter riders. At the center of the Jibfluence concept is a multi-radius sidecut and 3S serrated edges, which give the board precision control on the hardpack. Pair that with a nice soft flex pattern for a playful, easygoing feel, and the result is a board that's fun and powerful for youngsters looking to get tricky.

title: Burton Chopper Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: Set your kid up for success by getting them on the Burton Chopper Snowboard. With a range of sizes suited for bigger kids all the way down to the tiniest nuggets, the Chopper is designed to instill a love of snowboarding in kids of all ages. The Flat Top Easy Bevel design makes it hard to catch an edge, and the smooth contours and flex profile make the board fun and forgiving for little rippers to learn the ropes.

title: Nidecker Merc Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Let them take ownership of the sport. The Nidecker Merc Snowboard is for young kids who don't need a proctor to chaperone their turns anymore. Bunny hills are done, time for this snowshoe hare to start hopping around the mountain. The low-maintenance base under a strong, responsive wood core provides perfect flex and comfortable landings to support growing bodies.

title: Nidecker Flake Snowboard - Girls' 2023
description: The Nidecker Flake Snowboard is for the young rippers looking to take this world by storm. Standard CamRock makes this an all-terrain, any condition type of board, so nothing will stand in their way as they master the craft. The reliable N-5000 base is tough and wax-absorbent — easy maintenance for you, smooth ride for the young one, year after year.

title: K2 Mini Turbo Snowboard - Little Boys' 2022 - Used
description: Spool up that turbo, and get ready for some pint-sized fun - the K2 Mini Turbo Snowboard has been the gateway to grom greatness for years, and this one is no different. A user-friendly rocker-flat-rocker profile and easy-going Catch-Free™ Tune make this the choice for youth shredders everywhere.

title: Nitro Miniganger Splitboard - Kids' 2022
description: Going for a long walk in the backcountry? Get your mini-me in on the action with the Nitro Miniganger Splitboard. This sized down split delivers the same technology and construction as the adult version, perfect for young rippers in the business of earning their turns. It transitions quickly and seamlessly from tour to ride mode, and features Nitro's Cam-Out Camber and Power Core construction for buttery smooth riding all the way back to the trailhead.

title: Never Summer Yutes Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: If you want to light a fire under the next generation of shredders, put them on the Never Summer Yutes Snowboard. Featuring the Original Rocker Camber profile and the same quality construction and materials as their adult boards, the Yutes provides smooth turns and easy, no slam progression for smaller riders. They'll be moving fast – all you have to do is keep up!

title: Nitro Ripper Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: Snowboarding mastery doesn't happen by accident: it takes a positive mindset, a willingness to take risks, and great gear. Your grom has the first two covered, the Nitro Ripper Snowboard will take care of the rest. This is a legit full wood core board with Nitro's Flat-Out Rocker and Softride Flex for easy learning and turning. It's lively, durable, and comes with a classic twin tip shape, perfect for goofing around the park after a tough morning lesson.

title: K2 Vandal Snowboard - Boys' 2022
description: The K2 Vandal Snowboard is an ideal tool for youth progression, with its calculated twin shape and flat camber profile. Less body slams = more fun = kids who can't wait for the next day on the hill.

title: Ride Lowride Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: The Ride Lowride Snowboard is designed for little shredders on the up, with a catch free Twin Rocker profile that makes turning easy as pie. Fun, forgiving, and expertly crafted to encourage progression, the Lowride is sure to spark a lifetime of Winter stoke.

title: Jones Mini Mind Expander Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: It won't take long to realize that the Jones Mini Mind Expander Snowboard ain't your average junior board. Built with the same features and attention to detail as the full size version, this directional shape is perfect for mini shredders already looking outside the box for creative lines to surf down the mountain. Designed by Chris Christenson and Jeremy Jones with surf rocker for epic float in pow and a short sidecut for snappy turns in tight terrain, it'll propel your grom to new heights on snow.

title: Nidecker Micron Snowday Snowboard - Little Kids' 2022
description: Get the hot chocolate ready, the Nidecker Micron Snowday Snowboard is the perfect addition to your weekend family time. With beveled footpads and a removable tow rope, pull your future shredder towards starting their love for the snow right.

title: Nidecker Micron Snowday Snowboard - Little Kids' 2022 - Used
description: Get the hot chocolate ready, the Nidecker Micron Snowday Snowboard is the perfect addition to your weekend family time. With beveled footpads and a removable tow rope, pull your future shredder towards starting their love for the snow right.

title: K2 Vandal Snowboard - Boys' 2023
description: The K2 Vandal Snowboard is like a good teacher. It's the perfect blend of challenging and forgiving. It provides young riders with the tools they need to progress on the slopes, rewards success, and encourages experimentation. With this board on their feet, they'll soon find their skills blossoming, and their snowboarding report card will be all A's and S-turns.

title: CAPiTA Micro Mini Snowboard - Little Kids' 2023
description: The time has finally come. Your mini-me has reached snowboarding age. Covered head to toe multiple layers, the littlest goggles and helmet and itsy bitsy boots with only one item remaining: the CAPiTA Micro Mini Snowboard! This boards is ideal for first-timers (and their parents) thanks to a unique convex shape with raised edges for minimal edge catching. Pack the PB&Js, it's time to spark a lifelong passion with the CAPiTA Micro Mini Snowboard.

title: GNU Young Money C2E Snowboard - Big Boys' 2023
description: The GNU Young Money C2E Snowboard is built for the kids pushing it in the terrain park. It's a full featured freestyle deck that's exactly the same as the grownups' GNU Money, just in a smaller set of sizes. It's chock full of poppy, pivoty fun for any freestyle-minded rider. Plus, it's built with bombproof construction and materials so it can take a beating.

title: CAPiTA Scott Stevens Mini Snowboard - Boys' 2023
description: Some things are inevitable. Night will follow day, fearsome empires will become victims of their own fubris and fall into decline, and your kid will one day be a better snowboarder than you. The best you can do is help them along the way, and there's no better tool than the CAPiTA Scott Stevens Mini Snowboard. With a a soft, poppy flex and a low maintenance extruded base, this one is built tough and custom made for kids honing their skills both in and out of the park.

title: K2 Kandi Snowboard - Girls' 2023
description: The K2 Kandi Snowboard is like a good teacher. It's the perfect blend of challenging and forgiving. It provides young riders with the tools they need to progress on the slopes, rewards success, and encourages experimentation. With this board on their feet, they'll soon find their skills blossoming, and their snowboarding report card will be all A's and S-turns.

title: Salomon Oh Yeah Grom Snowboard - Big Girls' 2023
description: The Salomon Oh Yeah Grom Snowboard is the freestyle, peppy board your little shredders need to take their riding to the next level. Whether they're starting to link turns or popping off lips in the park, the Bite Free Edges and Popster and Aspen cores will give them the control and forgiving feel they need to master the mountain.

title: Salomon Huck Knife Grom Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: If your kids are shredding as hard as you are then they deserve a board to match their skills. The Salomon Huck Knife Grom Snowboard is a fun-sized version of the adult classic and can handle youngsters' wildest stunts. The true twin shape and de-tuned freestyle edges at the tip and tail are ready for park laps and the Quad Camber profile and Popster core add playful snap to their most creative moves.

title: Salomon Sleepwalker Grom Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: The first few days on a snowboard can be rough, so give your little ones some extra help with the Salomon Sleepwalker Grom Snowboard. Rock Out Camber and Bite Free Edges are forgiving enough for beginners but they'll also appreciate the true twin shape and playful Popster core as they progress from falling leaf to master carver.

title: Salomon Dancehaul Grom Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: Unique shapes are all the rage for adult snowboards, so let your kiddos in on the fun with the Salomon Dancehaul Grom Snowboard. The wide width and tapered tail gives them the floatation they need in powder and put them on the right path to becoming master carvers. The Rock Out Camber provides a fun, freestyle feeling too, so they can get air time anywhere on the mountain.

title: Lib Tech Dynasword C3 Snowboard - Big Boys' 2023
description: The Lib Tech Dynasword C3 Snowboard is a directional freeride board for riders that rip hard enough to need the top-level boards, but aren't yet big enough to fit any of the sizes. It's only for kids, but charges so hard, many adult riders wish it came in bigger sizes. The TNT base, C3 camber, and smooth mid-stiff flex combine to make the Dynasword edgy, stable, and fast.

title: Lib Tech T.Ripper C2 Snowboard 2023
description: In freeride hotbeds like Jackson, Wyoming, they are blessed with the problem of having too many kids who rip harder than 90% of adults ever will. But the only boards that fit them are progression minded kids' boards with soft flex profiles and low-end tech. Rising up to right the wrongs, the Lib Tech T.Ripper C2 Snowboard is a smaller version of the T-Rice Pro that offers the same world conquering top end for shredders who can't yet fit the adult sizes. Soon to be seen on a junior freeride comp podium at a mountain near you.

title: CAPiTA Children Of The Pow Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Let's face it, powder is even better when you're a kid. That 4" overnight refresh feels like double when you're less than 5' tall, so it helps to have gear to match the conditions. The CAPiTA Children Of The Pow Snowboard is an powder-specific youth deck for the next-generation of powder hounds. It features a lightweight FSC Certified Select 2.0 Core and Capita's Surf Rocker Profile for effortless turns in the deep.

title: CAPiTA Children Of The Gnar Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: When it comes time to celebrate your kiddo's shred-mitzvah - that is, the moment they come of age and hit the big jumps in the park - tradition dictates that you upgrade their beat up hand-me-down board to the CAPiTA Children Of The Gnar Snowboard. With features like next-generation hybrid camber, this high performance tween-age destroyer can go anywhere and do anything a young freestyler puts his mind to.

title: CAPiTA Jess Kimura Mini Snowboard - Girls' 2023
description: Some things are inevitable. Night will follow day, fearsome empires will become victims of their own fubris and fall into decline, and your kid will one day be a better snowboarder than you. The best you can do is help them along the way, and there's no better tool than the CAPiTA Jess Kimura Mini Snowboard. With a a soft, poppy flex and a low maintenance extruded base, this one is built tough and custom made for kids honing their skills both in and out of the park.

title: Arbor Cheater Rocker Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Cheater cheater pumpkin eater! The Arbor Cheater Rocker Snowboard helps them skip the awkward phase and progress their riding with ease. This board has all the features of its adult companions, with System Rocker that's catch free and easy to control. It's all the Arbor performance you love in a package made for enthusiastic mini shredders.

title: Ride Zero Jr Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: The Ride Zero Jr Snowboard continues the grownup Zero's mission of inclusivity and accessibility by offering the same asymmetrical freestyle goodness in even more sizes. By adding the Zero Jr into the mix, any rider who wants one can have access to a rippin' asym twin. This board is fully featured, super durable, and a ton of fun for any smaller rider who wants playful carving feels and high end park performance.

title: Arbor Satori Youth Camber Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: For small shredders that don't hold back, put them Arbor Satori Youth Camber Snowboard and let them rip with all the power and prose they deserve. Inspired by pro rider Bryan Iguchi's love of friendly, fun, and stable boards, the Satori Youth is a fully constructed board with System Camber for Stability and a softer flex that's easy to butter, carve, and love.

title: Yes. Firstpow Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Get them hooked early with the Yes. Firstpow Snowboard. Created with Yes's signature 420 board in mind, this fully constructed pow slayer has directional blended rocker and a full poplar core. Let them experience the feeling of floating before they stop wanting to hang out with you on the hill.

title: Yes. First Basic Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: For the tweener with skillzz who's outgrown those cutsey kids boards and beats you down the hill, the Yes. First Basic Snowboard is the perfect foray into equipment with oomph. Constructed with Yes's signature design and an easy to maneuver flat rocker profile, the First Basic certainly won't be their last.

title: Nitro Spirit Snowboard - Little Kids' 2023
description: When this spirit moves you, you're going to take notice. The Nitro Spirit Snowboard is a new freestyle twin shape from Nitro that positively encourages progression no matter which way you point it. A full length core of Poplar wood is the industry standard for power and durability, and the soft flex means everything from turns to tricks is more forgiving.

title: Nitro Ripper Snowboard - Little Kids' 2023
description: Kids with the mindset to succeed in snowboarding generally do, provided they have the right gear and patient instruction. Get them in on the good stuff from the start with the Nitro Ripper Snowboard and watch them fly. With a forgiving rocker-flat-rocker Flat Out profile and a twin shape that won't prevent them from sliding either way, this is the way to get them up and ripping ASAP.

title: Nitro Ripper Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: Kids with the mindset to succeed in snowboarding generally do, provided they have the right gear and patient instruction. Get them in on the good stuff from the start with the Nitro Ripper Snowboard and watch them fly. With a forgiving rocker-flat-rocker Flat Out profile and a twin shape that won't prevent them from sliding either way, this is the way to get them up and ripping ASAP.

title: Nitro Spirit Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: When this spirit moves you, you're going to take notice. The Nitro Spirit Snowboard is a new freestyle twin shape from Nitro that positively encourages progression no matter which way you point it. A full length core of Poplar wood is the industry standard for power and durability, and the soft flex means everything from turns to tricks is more forgiving.

title: Nitro Ripper x Volcom Snowboard - Little Kids' 2023
description: Kids with the mindset to succeed in snowboarding generally do, provided they have the right gear and patient instruction. Get them in on the good stuff from the start with the Nitro Ripper Snowboard and watch them fly. With a forgiving rocker-flat-rocker Flat Out profile and a twin shape that won't prevent them from sliding either way, this is the way to get them up and ripping ASAP.

title: Nitro Ripper x Volcom Snowboard - Big Kids' 2023
description: Kids with the mindset to succeed in snowboarding generally do, provided they have the right gear and patient instruction. Get them in on the good stuff from the start with the Nitro Ripper x Volcom Snowboard and watch them fly. With a forgiving rocker-flat-rocker Flat Out profile and a twin shape that won't prevent them from sliding either way, this is the way to get them up and ripping ASAP.

title: K2 Lil Mini Snowboard - Little Boys' 2022
description: The K2 Lil Mini Snowboard is just the ticket for young riders beginning their snowboarding careers. The Noodle Core construction and Catch-Free Rocker make the Lil Mini extremely forgiving, and a soft flex compliments the package perfectly to give your ripper a head start all over the mountain.

title: K2 Lil Kat Snowboard - Little Girls' 2022
description: The K2 Lil Kat Snowboard is just the ticket for young riders beginning their snowboarding careers. The Noodle Core construction and Catch-Free Rocker make the Lil Kat extremely forgiving, and a soft flex compliments the package perfectly to give your ripper a head start all over the mountain.

title: Nidecker Micron Magic Snowboard - Little Kids' 2023
description: The Nidecker Micron Magic snowboard is made for the budding boarder who wants to move from the tow rope to the blue runs in a hurry. Built-in risers for decreased toe drag means a board that's designed to be friendly enough for the growing groms of the world.

title: Nitro Squash Snowboard - Kids' 2021
description: The adult-size Squash Snowboard is already one of Nitro's most sought after models, and this version lets pint-sized shredders get in on the act too. It's a do-anything deck for ripping groms who like to ride fast and tackle the entire mountain with the kind of style that puts the adults to shame. Trüe Camber ensures ample stability, pop, and responsiveness, while the tapered swallowtail shape and progressive sidecut make it seriously surfy when there's a little fresh to play with. Keep it in the family this season with the Nitro Squash Snowboard.

title: CAPiTA Children Of The Gnar Snowboard - Kids' 2022
description: There comes a time when he will rip harder than you. Unfortunately, it's inevitable. The best thing you can do is get him there faster, and the CAPiTA Children Of The Gnar Snowboard is designed to do exactly that. With features like next-generation hybrid camber, this board can go anywhere and do anything a young freestyler puts his mind to.

title: Jones Ultra Prodigy Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: The Jones Ultra Prodigy Snowboard takes their high performance youth board to new heights, with more pop, response, and capabilities. This board is much stiffer than most, making it the perfect next step before a full-on adult board. It's running full traditional camber throughout its length, ready for harder charging riders who want to lock into carves, boost jumps, and just generally rip. It still has that great shape and subtle 3D base contouring to keep things from getting too much to handle, but it's no beginner board. Get Ultra!

title: Jones Prodigy Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: When they're progressing like crazy and tackling lines that have you going back and forth between parental fear and pride, it's time to hook them up with a tool that can really develop their skills; the Jones Prodigy Snowboard. Designed with high-quality materials, an easygoing flex, and a versatile directional twin shape with directional rocker, the Prodigy helps them find their way as they develop their own unique style.

title: Bataleon Stuntwood Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: The Bataleon Stuntwood Snowboard is a scaled-down Evil Twin that reeks of teenage terror. As a full-on park board, the Stuntwood comes loaded with a bulletproof Superslick Base, and catch-free 3BT™ with SideKick™ in the nose and tail. Built for the next generation of park rats, this is the board to push the freestyle boundaries ever further.

title: Bataleon Minishred Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Forget starting the kiddo out on two planks, get em going on the Bataleon Minishred Snowboard. Bataleon's Triple Base Technology makes learning to ride stress-free for everyone involved, and a true twin shape allows your little one to figure out their favorite stance. Plus, the Bataleon Minishred Snowboard is built to the same high standards as their adult boards for lasting durability you can count on.

title: Jones Youth Solution Splitboard - Kids' 2023
description: The Jones Youth Solution Splitboard is a sized-down splitboard for the smaller set with full-blown adult level features and quality. When the grom is ready for the transition into the backcountry, it's essential to get them geared up right, and trusting Jones to get it dailed is a no-brainer - they've been doing it longer than anyone. A host of subtle touches guarantee better grip while skinning, easier turn transitions in variable snow, and more powerful downhill performance when it's all together. A great solution for bigger kids and smaller adults.

title: Jones Flagship Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: If floppy, tepid beginner boards are holding your little ripper back, it's time to put them on one that can hang with the bigger riders. The Jones Flagship Snowboard offers the same high-octane freeride performance as the full size version, with directional rocker and 3D Base Contour 1.0 shaping surfy turns in the deep and Traction Tech 3.0 edges for locking into carves and hanging on in optimistic situations. When their equipment is up to the task, there's no stopping their progression.

title: Jones Mini Mind Expander Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: Mold their minds when they're most malleable. Teach the impressionable youth about roasting pow turns with the Jones Mini Mind Expander Snowboard. This board will take their riding beyond left-right-left on groomers to the hallowed temple of deep snow stoke. There's no rear-leg burn, no over-the-bars tumbles, no sluggish reactions here: this board is a deep snow tool that'll get them even more hyped on snowboarding. It's contagious, too. This is what it's all about!

title: Bataleon Surfer Mini Snowboard - Kids' 2023
description: We know there are no friends on a powder day, but that rule doesn't quite apply to family. Help your kiddos keep up with you after a big dump with the Bataleon Surfer Mini Snowboard. The long swallowtail and giant nose will keep them floating and the soft flex is easy for smaller riders to control. Bataleon's standard 3BT™ uplifted sidebases adds some extra buoyancy and smooth turn initiation so they'll still be ripping laps when your old legs give out.
